{"step_by_step_thinking": "The halo effect on an IOPA X-Ray is a radiographic feature that is typically associated with periapical lesions. It is not associated with horizontal root fractures, root caries, or widening of the periodontal ligament space. Periapical-periostitis, which is an inflammation of the periosteum and bone around the apex of a tooth, can cause this halo effect.", "answer_choice": "D"}
